properties.name: com.jasonpyau.chatapp.aws.access-key-id
properties.description: The AWS/Cloudflare R2 access key id.

properties.name: com.jasonpyau.chatapp.aws.secret-access-key
properties.description: The AWS/Cloudflare R2 secret access key.

properties.name: com.jasonpyau.chatapp.aws.endpoint
properties.description: The AWS endpoint used for AmazonS3Service.java. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/rande.html for AWS S3 or https://developers.cloudflare.com/r2/api/s3/api/ for Cloudflare R2 (Using AWS SDK)

properties.name: com.jasonpyau.chatapp.aws.bucket
properties.description: The AWS bucket used for AmazonS3Service.java.

properties.name: com.jasonpyau.chatapp.aws.public-bucket-url
properties.description: The AWS public url to the bucket where your S3 objects can be publicly accessed. See https://developers.cloudflare.com/r2/buckets/public-buckets/ for public R2 buckets.
